author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two mobile phone snatchers were nabbed by joggers at Marina Beach early on Friday. The youths, identified as Arun Kumar (18) from Korukkupet and Vicky (18) from Kannagi Nagar, snatched the mobile phone from a woman who was walking on the beach.

As they ran, the woman shouted for help, which alerted the people exercising nearby. However, the third thief, identified as Aravindan, managed to escape from the place.

The youths have been remanded by officials at the D5 Marina Beach police station.

—staff reporter
title: Mobile phone snatchers nabbed
